description:
For this course I will teach you how to completely create Facebook video ads through my online course. It will take you less than 1 hour and contains all of the necessary information to get started.

Facebook videos can dramatically expand your social reach and I will teach you how to HIT YOUR TARGET MARKET EVERY TIME!

Topics include:

  • Audience Insights (Finding peoples interests)
  • Setting Up Audiences (Retargeting)
  • Conversion Tracking (How much business the ad is bringing you)
  • Creating a video ad (actually setting it up)
  • Power editing (editing multiple ads at once to save time)
  • Reporting (Learn how to read the metrics)
Get down to as low as $.03 a view!

100% Satisfaction Guaranteed.

By 2017, 74% of all internet traffic is going to be video and 90% of people say that seeing a video is helpful in the decision making process...The stats speak for themselves!
title: Facebook Video Advertising
